name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poke Nextdoor Sellers, be happy & easy buyers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore local businesses in your neighborhood. Alice will take your order or appointment note and call sellers on your behalf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yho.me is your best secretary. She can run all kinds of errands, such as purchasing flowers or making a dentist appointment for you. She takes your note in text and calls the seller on your behalf. If the seller is not able to answer the phone call, she will leave voice message. The seller will fulfill the request, or may follow up with you in chat or on phone if more details are needed.

Benefits to you
You never wait on hold again.
You can avoid unimportant talks.
Your request is clearer to the seller.
She works for free, unless you have many assignments to her.
